entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:25 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 except minus 40 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 31 except minus 40 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 29 except minus 35 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 29 except minus 35 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
